TITLE: Enhance Your Images
SUBTITLE: 100% automatic and free
UPLOAD_INSTRUCTIONS: Click, paste, or drop files here to start
ABOUT: The ImageWizardIA is a tool that aims to enhance face photos.
DESCRIPTION: Our website is built to create and expand the range of possibilities for using AI tools in people's lives, using an innovative technique of Artificial Neural Networks, specifically GANs.
FAMILY_DESCRIPTION: ImageWizard offers the possibility to restore images of people who are no longer with us. Some users with old photos use our tool to better visualize the faces of their loved ones.
HISTORICAL_DESCRIPTION: Our system can also restore photos of historical figures, which often have very old photos or paintings with a lot of noise. Thus, we can refactor these images to better visualize the faces of these well-known personalities.
SECURITY_DESCRIPTION: ImageWizardAI improves the clarity of security camera images, which often have low resolution and loss of important details. With our technology, it is possible to enhance the visibility and details of captured faces, increasing the quality of footage. This makes facial recognition more reliable and video analysis more efficient for security agencies and monitoring system operators.
NAME: Name
